# NFCNDEFMessage

**Class**

An NFC NDEF message consisting of an array of payload records.

## Declaration

```swift
class NFCNDEFMessage
```

## Creating an NDEF Message

- **init(records:)**: Creates an NDEF message with the specified records.
- **init(data:)**: Creates an NDEF message from raw data representing the message.

## Accessing NDEF Records

- **records**: An array of records for the message.

## Getting the Message Length

- **length**: The length, in bytes, of the NDEF message when stored on an NFC tag.

## NDEF messages and payloads

- **NFCNDEFPayload**: A payload record in an NFC NDEF message.

- NSObject
